SELECT f.total_order_count, f.total_money, f.many_order_count, f.many_money, f.many_tax_money, f.total_tax_money, e.id, e.account_name, e.mobile_code, e.idcard_code, e.attestation, e.agreement_url, e.create_date FROM tb_worker e JOIN
f ON e.id = f.worker_id
AND e.id = #{workerId}
AND e.account_name like CONCAR('%',#{workerName},'%')
AND e.idcard_code like CONCAR('%',#{idCardCode},'%')
AND e.create_date >= #{startDate} + ' 00:00:00'
AND e.create_date <= #{endDate} + ' 23:59:59'
SELECT t.id,t.tax_name,t.tax_status FROM tb_tax t WHERE t.id NOT IN ( SELECT rt.tax_id FROM tb_regulator_tax rt INNER JOIN tb_tax a ON a.id=rt.tax_id WHERE rt.regulator_id=#{param2} )

SELECT pi.id, pi.worker_name, pi.mobile_code, pi.id_card_code, pi.bank_code, pi.real_money, pi.task_money, pi.service_money, pi.composite_tax, pi.merchant_payment_money FROM tb_payment_inventory pi WHERE pi.payment_order_id = #{param1}

SELECT po.id, po.company_s_name, po.platform_service_provider, po.company_contract, po.payment_inventory, po.acceptance_certificate, po.payment_order_status, po.create_date, t.task_code, t.task_name FROM
tb_payment_order po
tb_payment_order_many po
LEFT JOIN tb_task t ON t.id = po.task_id WHERE po.id = #{param1}

SELECT po.payment_mode, ci.company_name, ci.bank_name, ci.bank_code, t.tax_name, t.bank_name as t_bank_name, t.bank_code as t_bank_code, po.real_money,
po.turnkey_project_payment
po.many_payment as turnkey_project_payment
FROM
tb_payment_order po
tb_payment_order_many po
INNER JOIN tb_company_info ci ON ci.id = po.company_id INNER JOIN tb_tax t ON t.id = po.tax_id WHERE po.id =#{param1}

SELECT po.payment_mode, t.tax_name, t.bank_name, t.bank_code, po.worker_money, po.payment_inventory, po.subpackage_payment FROM tb_payment_order po INNER JOIN tb_company_info ci ON ci.id = po.company_id INNER JOIN tb_tax t ON t.id = po.tax_id WHERE po.id = #{paymentId}
